verbs.description: White House chief of staff John Kelly [V: is] confirming reports President Donald Trump launched a tirade at his homeland security secretary at a cabinet meeting .
[ARG0: White House chief of staff John Kelly] is [V: confirming] [ARG1: reports President Donald Trump launched a tirade at his homeland security secretary at a cabinet meeting] .
